title: Reflections from the Edge: Two decades of essays on race, culture and politics from a young southern writer
description: The manuscript is a compilation of articles and essays that are grounded in critical race theory and common sense southern values. The essays in the text are reviews of and responses to current events over the last 2 decades. Thus, topics range from the OJ Simpson trial to 9/11 and the war on terrorism and their impact on African Americans and race relations in America.
author: Jonathan N. Livingston
